data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Kasganj who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kasganj, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Kasganj, Uttar Pradesh, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Kasganj to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Kasganj, Uttar Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 100,186 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bania Palliwal people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 1,114 believers living in the county of Kasganj. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Kasganj, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kasganj, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 101,300.

We estimate Kasganj has 1,114 people who might know Jesus, 1,229 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 98,957 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Kasganj, Uttar Pradesh, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.
